activities:
Personal information is transferred to LCG Discovery Experts, LLC, in the United 
States from the E.U. and Switzerland for the purpose of providing legal technology consulting 
and response services on behalf of and at the direction of corporate counsel 
and law firms. 
LCG has the ability to send our experienced personnel on-site to forensically collect data  or through the use of remote imaging, offering counsel the luxury of collecting data without sending personnel around the world for data collections - all within the Safe Harbor framework.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) or their authorized representatives; or AAA
